home.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
home.description: I work at PepsiCo building data tools and full-stack applications. I like figuring out how to make things work better, whether that's improving a UI or making backend systems run faster.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm a Software Engineer / Data Scientist at PepsiCo, where I build data quality frameworks and optimize pipelines to help teams work more efficiently. Most of my day is spent in Python and Databricks, trying to make complicated things simple.
about.paragraph2: When I'm not coding, I'm usually playing guitar in my band eileen, climbing at the gym, or watching the Guardians lose in heartbreaking fashion. I tend to dive deep into whatever I'm interested in at the moment.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: Side projects where I experiment with new tech and bring ideas to life

applySimple.name: ApplySimple
applySimple.description: A modern full-stack job application tracker with AI-powered insights to optimize your job search strategy. Features smart analytics dashboards with interactive charts, ML-powered success predictions, secure authentication with password reset, CSV bulk import, and beautiful dark mode support.
features: Built full-stack app with Next.js 15 (App Router) and React 19
Developed FastAPI ML microservice for success probability predictions
Designed PostgreSQL 16 database with Prisma ORM for data management
Implemented secure authentication with NextAuth.js and email password reset via Resend
Created interactive analytics dashboard with Recharts visualizations and ML insights

scoutMaster.name: ScoutMaster
scoutMaster.description: A mobile app that helps you find and visit the real-world locations where your favorite movies and TV shows were filmed. Explore interactive maps, get directions, and discover behind-the-scenes details about iconic filming spots.
process: Built cross-platform mobile app with React Native for iOS and Android
Integrated Google Maps API for interactive location exploration
Designed REST API with Node.js and MongoDB to manage filming locations
Implemented Firebase Auth for user accounts and saved locations

portfolio.name: Interactive Portfolio
portfolio.description: This portfolio site (yes, the one you're looking at right now... pretty meta, I know). Built with a custom cursor that follows you around and a gradient effect that moves with your mouse. Features multi-language support for 10 languages, smooth animations, dark mode, and live API integrations pulling data from Spotify and MLB.
highlights: Multi-language support (i18n) for 10 languages with browser detection and persistent preferences
Custom cursor with hover effects (hides on mobile devices)
Dynamic gradient spotlight that tracks your mouse
Dockerized with automated CI/CD for easy deployment
Real-time API integrations showing current Spotify plays and Cleveland Guardians stats

experience.title: Experience
experience.subtitle: Where I've worked and what I've built

details: Created a Python framework that validates data quality across pipelines, which the team adopted company-wide for consistency. It automatically flags issues and generates reports, saving hours of manual checks.
Improved pipeline efficiency by 30% through parallelized error detection and optimized reporting logic, making data processing significantly faster during peak periods.
Collaborated with engineering and DevOps teams to deliver scalable Azure and Docker deployments, boosting system uptime and data reliability across the platform.
Worked closely with business teams to develop new features that surface key insights on market share and other critical metrics, helping stakeholders make data-driven decisions.
Built ML models that predict demand patterns and catch ETL issues before they cause problems. This reduced the time engineers spent debugging by about 40%.
Set up automated dashboards that visualize data quality metrics and forecasts, making it easier for the team to spot trends and anomalies at a glance.
Developed a solar pricing tool using Svelte, Node.js, and PostgreSQL that generates real-time quotes based on customer inputs and current pricing data.
Streamlined the quoting workflow by building a responsive interface that cut generation time by 20%, helping the sales team close deals faster.

education.title: Education
education.subtitle: Academic foundation in Computer Science and Software Engineering

bullets: Highlighted Courses: Software Development for AI, Usability Testing in Software Engineering, Analysis of Computer Algorithms
Awarded the CSCE Undergrduate Cybersecurity Certificate
